title: Campbell Palmer
text: Campbell Roger "Buddy" Palmer (born 29 April 1936) is a Canadian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he defeated <a href="Gabriel%20Achy%20Assi">Gabriel Achy Assi</a> of the Ivory Coast, before losing to <a href="Stoyan%20Pilichev">Stoyan Pilichev</a> of Bulgaria. Prior to competing at the Olympics, he competed in <a href="Haney%2C%20British%20Columbia">Haney, British Columbia</a> and <a href="100%20Mile%20House">100 Mile House</a>, British Columbia.
